results.title: Metformin: A potential adjunct for treatment of systemic mastocytosis
results.text_hl: In recent years, nonchemotherapeutic medications such as @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ have been repurposed for this role because of their ability to destroy CSCs from both solid @DISEASE_Neoplasms @DISEASE_MESH:D009369 @@@tumors@@@ and @<m>DISEASE_Leukemia</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D007938 @@@leukemias@@@ and also because of their ability to act as chemosensitizers.
